column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We've been here twice so far and haven't been let down even in the slightest! The first time we split the large steak among 2 people and it was amazing. Perfectly cooked and amazing seasonings. We were celebrating a birthday and were surprised to have some chocolate icecream brought out to us at the end of the meal
column2: which was probably some of the best chocolate icecream I've ever had and I'm not even a fan of chocolate icecream!
